mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monthly_snapshot(user_id, month, total_asset, balance, total_amount, computed_at) VALUES(#{userId}, #{month}, #{totalAsset}, #{income}, #{expense}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_asset = VALUES(total_asset), balance = VALUES(balance), total_amount= VALUES(total_amount), computed_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(a.balance),0) FROM account a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_active = 1

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN l.type='INCOME' THEN l.amount END),0) AS income, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN l.type='EXPENSE' THEN l.amount END),0) AS expense FROM (SELECT 1) one LEFT JOIN ledger l ON l.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(l.date,'%Y-%m') = #{month}
